items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript application built on Node.js to fetch the current date and time from an NTP server. Features include Jest for robust unit testing, Docker integration for seamless deployment, and compatibility with Alpine Linux.

items.content_html: Scrap NPM Package is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to simplify asynchronous web scraping. It provides AI-powered data extraction capabilities and supports both Node.js and Deno environments. With features like customizable prompts, callback support, secure webhook verification, and optional structured data extraction using Zod schemas,
